title.narrative: Office of Child Labor, Forced Labor, and Human Trafficking (OCFT) - Youth Pathways to Leadership, Learning, and Livelihoods in Costa Rica

description.narrative: This project brings together key government agencies, employers, workers' organizations, and civil society to collaborate on establishing and expanding work-based training programs for youth, such as apprenticeships, with a focus on including vulnerable and marginalized youth.

receiver-org.narrative: YouthBuild International
